name: Super Monkey Drifter
description:
A game made for the 100 line of code game jam!

Super Monkey Drifter is my take on a rage game where the controls make you think about every move you take. Drift too much in one direction and you'll have to start all over.

I might flesh out this idea more in the future.

Thanks for playing (:

Music made by me in Bosca Ceoil
